Text:
Improves the UI for observing games and watching replays.

Due to technical restrictions the UI is implemented as a game mode. Playing the new game mode is aimed to be indistinguishable from playing the 'Standard' game mode.

https://github.com/kuschAoe/AoE4_ObserverUI
kusch_AOE#6566
The standard, competitive game mode with a variety of match options and win conditions and an improved observer UI.
